description.zh-cn: 中国战国时代法家“术”派的代表人物，曾在韩国担任宰相近二十年，并推行改革。其主要思想体现在“形名参同”的行政管理方法中。
description.en: A representative figure of the 'Shu' (administrative methods) school of Legalism during the Warring States period of China. He served as the chancellor of the State of Han for nearly twenty years and implemented reforms. His main ideas are embodied in the administrative method of 'Xingming Cantong' (performance and title).

description.zh-cn: 中国战国时期的一个诸侯国，战国七雄之一。
description.en: A vassal state during the Warring States period of China, one of the Seven Warring States.

description.zh-cn: 战国时期韩国的君主，在位期间任用申不害为相，推行改革，使韩国国力增强。
description.en: The monarch of the State of Han during the Warring States period. During his reign, he appointed Shen Buhai as chancellor to carry out reforms, which strengthened the state.

description.zh-cn: 中国春秋战国时期的一个诸侯国，后被韩国所灭。
description.en: A vassal state during the Spring and Autumn and Warring States periods of China, later annexed by the State of Han.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代诸子百家中的一个重要思想流派，主张以法治国。
description.en: An important school of thought among the Hundred Schools of Thought in ancient China, advocating for governance by law.

description.zh-cn: 古代中国辅佐君主处理政务的最高官职。
description.en: The highest official position in ancient China, assisting the monarch in handling government affairs.

description.zh-cn: 战国时期郑国的都城，位于今河南省荥阳市。
description.en: The capital of the State of Zheng during the Warring States period, located in present-day Xingyang, Henan.

description.zh-cn: 战国时期韩国的都城，位于今河南省新郑市。
description.en: The capital of the State of Han during the Warring States period, located in present-day Xinzheng, Henan.

description.zh-cn: 中国河南省下辖的县级市。
description.en: A county-level city under the jurisdiction of Henan Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 申不害的著作，法家重要典籍，现已亡佚。
description.en: The work of Shen Buhai, an important classic of the Legalist school, which is now lost.

description.zh-cn: 法家思想的核心概念之一，指君主驾驭臣下的策略和方法。
description.en: One of the core concepts of Legalist thought, referring to the strategies and methods used by a ruler to control his subordinates.

description.zh-cn: 中国战国时期法家代表人物之一，主张“势”。
description.en: A representative figure of the Legalist school during the Warring States period of China, who emphasized 'Shi' (power/authority).

description.zh-cn: 中国战国时期法家代表人物之一，主张“法”。
description.en: A representative figure of the Legalist school during the Warring States period of China, who emphasized 'Fa' (law).

description.zh-cn: 由申不害发明的行政管理方法，通过比较官员申报的任务预算“名”与实际完成的成绩“形”，对其进行考核。
description.en: An administrative management method invented by Shen Buhai, which assesses officials by comparing their declared task budgets ('ming' or name/title) with their actual achievements ('xing' or form/reality).

description.zh-cn: 指中国先秦时期各种思想学术流派的总称。
description.en: A collective term for the various philosophical and academic schools of thought that flourished during the pre-Qin period in China.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的国家，拥有悠久的历史和文明。
description.en: A country in East Asia with a long history and civilization.

description.zh-cn: 申不害在郑国被韩国所灭前，曾担任郑国的低阶官吏。
description.en: Before the State of Zheng was annexed by the State of Han, Shen Buhai served as a low-ranking official in Zheng.

description.zh-cn: 申不害出生于郑国京邑。
description.en: Shen Buhai was born in Jingyi, the capital of the State of Zheng.

description.zh-cn: 韩国灭亡了郑国。
description.en: The State of Han annexed the State of Zheng.

description.zh-cn: 韩昭侯赏识申不害的学说，任命其为宰相。
description.en: Marquis Zhao of Han appreciated Shen Buhai's theories and appointed him as chancellor.

description.zh-cn: 申不害在韩昭侯麾下担任宰相，辅佐其进行改革。
description.en: Shen Buhai served as chancellor under Marquis Zhao of Han, assisting him in carrying out reforms.

description.zh-cn: 申不害在韩国担任宰相近二十年。
description.en: Shen Buhai served as the chancellor of the State of Han for nearly twenty years.

description.zh-cn: 申不害的改革使韩国在其执政期间国力富足，军事强大，达到了国治兵强的状态。
description.en: Shen Buhai's reforms made the State of Han prosperous and militarily strong during his administration, achieving a state of good governance and powerful military.

description.zh-cn: 申不害是法家中“术”派的代表人物。
description.en: Shen Buhai is the representative figure of the 'Shu' (administrative methods) school within Legalism.

description.zh-cn: 申不害是《申子》的作者。
description.en: Shen Buhai is the author of the 'Shenzi'.

description.zh-cn: 申不害发明了“形名参同”这一行政管理方法。
description.en: Shen Buhai invented the administrative management method known as 'Xingming Cantong'.

description.zh-cn: 慎到是法家中“势”派的代表人物。
description.en: Shen Dao is a representative figure of the 'Shi' (power/authority) school within Legalism.

description.zh-cn: 商鞅是法家中“法”派的代表人物。
description.en: Shang Yang is a representative figure of the 'Fa' (law) school within Legalism.

description.zh-cn: 法家是先秦诸子百家中的一个重要流派。
description.en: Legalism is an important school of thought among the pre-Qin Hundred Schools of Thought.

description.zh-cn: 古代的京邑位于今天的河南省荥阳市境内。
description.en: The ancient city of Jingyi is located within the territory of modern-day Xingyang, Henan Province.
